Class NexTagCrawler

java.lang.Object
  Crawler
      NexTagCrawler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class NexTagCrawler
extends Crawler

NexTagCrawler class: derived from Crawler This class will spawn a crawler to fetch all information based on a given tag from the website www.nextag.com.

Author:
nate kemavaha
